author: radu
msg: SLING-4787 - Change the DynamicClassLoader used by the Sightly scripting engine

used for generating Java classes from Sightly scripts

author: radu
msg: SLING-4783 - The JavaScript scripting engine can generate classloader leaks
* implemented Rhino class cache cleaning if the current thread's class loader is a DynamicClassLoader
